alert.note: Alert for Bertie; Gates; Hertford; Northampton (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 19 at 9:55PM EDT until October 20 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 9 AM EDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 to 32 expected. * WHERE...Portions of northeast North Carolina and central, east central, south central and southeast Virginia. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 9 AM EDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Local variation is expected with some urban areas including downtown Richmond likely remaining above freezing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
